channel.title: Writing on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: How Org-mode has significantly uplifted my life
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Needs versus software’s development Everybody’s needs are unique Concluding points Introduction There are several videos, articles, complex manuals, customisable code snippets, all borne on a long, rich history behind emacs, and Orgmode. I doubt I can add much to those articles, except to share my viewpoint on why I think org mode should be learnt and utilised by more people. It will probably also cover why it won’t be utilised by those people.
